events.message: We have successfully received the application from the candidate for the software engineer position, and their resume shows strong development skills.
The application has been categorized under Engineering based on the candidate mentioning extensive experience with software development and devops practices.
A recruiter has been assigned to the candidate to coordinate the next steps and ensure smooth communication during the hiring process.
The initial screening call went well; the candidate demonstrated strong knowledge in software engineering principles and a good cultural fit.
The candidate promptly responded to the interview scheduling request and expressed eagerness to proceed with the technical interview.
The technical interview has been scheduled for next week, allowing the candidate to demonstrate their software development and devops skills.
